api.waitText: Login is taking longer than usual. Obtaining token...

errors.emptyFields: Please enter both username/email and password

csv.description: Before exporting your data from the Hevy app, ensure that your app language is set to English and that the weight unit is KG.

errors.invalidFile: Invalid file. Please select a valid CSV file (max 10MB)
errors.emptyFile: CSV file is empty or contains no workout data
errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload CSV. Please check the file format.

apikey.description: Enter your Hevy PRO API key. You can get it from https://hevy.com/settings?developer
apikey.label: API Key
apikey.placeholder: Enter your Hevy PRO API key

errors.invalidKey: Invalid API key. Please check and try again.
errors.validationFailed: Failed to validate API key. Please try again.

charts.workoutCalendarDescription: Workout consistency over the last 12 months
charts.notSupported: This chart is not available when using Hevy PRO API Key. This feature requires username/password (OAuth) login.

card.title: Workouts (Card)
card.subtitle: Browse your workouts in a card design.

list.title: Workouts (List)
list.subtitle: Browse your workouts in a detailed list format with contribution calendar.

exercises.title: Exercises
exercises.subtitle: Detailed analysis and progress tracking for each exercise.

insights.plateau: Your top set has hovered around {weight} for {repsMin}-{repsMax} reps. Try adding more weight or reps to break the plateau!
insights.plateauCardio: Your performance has plateaued around {metric}. Try increasing distance or pace!
insights.gaining: You've increased by {weightChange} or {repsChange} reps over your last {sessions} sessions!
insights.gainingCardio: Great progress! You've improved by {change}% over your last {sessions} sessions!
insights.losing: Performance decreased by {weightChange} or {repsChange} reps over your last {sessions} sessions. Consider rest or form check.
insights.losingCardio: Performance decreased by {change}% over your last {sessions} sessions. Consider rest or check your training.
insights.insufficient: Not enough data yet. Need at least {needed} sessions, currently have {sessions}.
insights.inactive: Not trained in {days} days. Resume training to track progress!
insights.maintaining: Performance is stable. You're maintaining your current strength level.

warnings.repVolumeTitle: Not available with Hevy PRO API key login mode!
warnings.repVolumeMessage: Cannot calculate bodyweight exercise rep volume without bodyweight data. This feature requires username/password (OAuth) login since that method uses the body measurement API endpoints.

share.title: Share Your Progress
share.subtitle: Create beautiful cards to share your achievements on social media
share.generateFailed: Failed to generate image. Please try again.

cardMottos.workoutStreakFooter: Consistency is the key to greatness • Track your journey
cardMottos.strengthInNumbersFooter: Every rep counts • Building strength one workout at a time
cardMottos.breakingBarriersFooter: Pushing limits • Setting new standards • Never settling
cardMottos.timeWellInvestedFooter: Time dedicated to self-improvement • Progress over perfection
cardMottos.favoriteMoveFooter: Mastering your craft • Focus and dedication pay off
cardMottos.yearInReviewFooter: A year of growth and transformation • Here's to the next chapter

themes.title: Color Theme
themes.description: Choose your preferred color scheme for charts and accents

dateTimeFormat.title: Date & Time Formats
dateTimeFormat.description: Customize how dates and times are displayed

weightUnit.title: Weight Unit
weightUnit.description: Choose your preferred weight unit for display

plateauDetection.title: Plateau Detection
plateauDetection.description: Customize how many recent sessions to analyze for plateau detection
plateauDetection.hint: Analyze your last N sessions to detect plateaus (minimum 3, maximum 100). Default is 5.

updateCheck.title: Update Notifications
updateCheck.description: Get notified when new versions are available
updateCheck.hint: Automatically check for new releases on GitHub. You can disable this if you prefer to check manually.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: View information about your data source
dataManagement.csvNote: You are using CSV mode. Data is stored locally, no API used.

bodyMeasurements.title: Body Measurements
bodyMeasurements.subtitle: Track your weight and body composition over time

proApiWarning.title: Feature not available with Hevy PRO API key login mode!
proApiWarning.message: To track body measurements, you need to login with Hevy username/password login method since that method uses the body measurement API endpoints.

bodyMeasurements.noMeasurements: No measurements yet. Start tracking your progress!
bodyMeasurements.bodyFatNote: Optional. Required for FFMI calculation. Can be measured with body composition scales or calipers.
bodyMeasurements.heightNote: Height is used to calculate BMI and FFMI. This will be saved for future use.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences

heightSettings.title: Height Settings
heightSettings.description: Set your height to calculate BMI and FFMI. This setting is used across all your body measurements.
heightSettings.heightNote: Your height will be saved and used for BMI and FFMI calculations in body measurements.
heightSettings.noHeightSet: No height has been set yet. Enter your height above to get started.
heightSettings.warningTooHigh: This height value seems unusually high (>250cm). Please verify your input.
heightSettings.warningTooLow: This height value seems low (<150cm). Please verify your input.
